ABOUT ME

Let me tell you a little about myself.

Hi there, my name is Sava Mihai, I'm a front end web developer with a keen interest in becoming full stack.

I have a continuous improvement mindset, so I enjoy learning new things. I am proficient working with React.Js, or with plain HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the CSS frameworks: TailwindCss, Bootstrap and Sass. But also, I can manage and catch up with new technologies. I've been also introduced to C, Python, Flask and Sql through the lectures and problem sets in the Harvard CS50's Introduction to Computer Science.

I am a hard working, analytical person with problem solving skills, confident with my talent and knowledge which I achieved working on many projects, and continuously learning so, you can definitely think about me as being an asset. I would be happy to offer my experience and transform your ideas into the best possible product suited to your preferences and needs. So, if you're looking for a motivated developer who can take care of the front end of your project and work closely with you to get the job done right, then let's have a chat!
